verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5692><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? Shall we continue <S%G1961><s%> <S%G5692><s%> in sin <S%G266><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> may abound <S%G4121><s%> <S%G5661><s%>?

'Elohim forbid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5636><s%>. How <S%G4459><s%> shall we, that <S%G3748><s%> are dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to sin <S%G266><s%>, live <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5692><s%> any longer <S%G2089><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>?

<S%G2228><s%> Know ye not <S%G50><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, that so <S%G3754><s%> many of us <S%G3745><s%> as were immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5681><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> were immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5681><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>?

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> we are buried with <S%G4916><s%> <S%G5648><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> immersion <S%G908><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>: that <S%G2443><s%> like as <S%G5618><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> was raised up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5681><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%>, even so <S%G3779><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> should walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5661><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> newness <S%G2538><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we have been <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%> planted together <S%G4854><s%> in the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, we shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> also <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532><s%> in the likeness of his resurrection <S%G386><s%>:

Knowing <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5723><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is crucified with <S%G4957><s%> <S%G5681><s%> him, that <S%G2443><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> might be destroyed <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, that henceforth <S%G3371><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> should <S%G1398><s%> not <S%G3371><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> <S%G5721><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> he that is dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5631><s%> is freed <S%G1344><s%> <S%G5769><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we be dead <S%G599><s%> <S%G5627><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, we believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we shall <S%G4800><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> live <S%G4800><s%> <S%G5692><s%> with him <S%G846><s%>:

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> being raised <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> dieth <S%G599><s%> <S%G5719><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%>; death <S%G2288><s%> hath <S%G2961><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> dominion over <S%G2961><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> in that he died <S%G599><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, he died <S%G599><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto sin <S%G266><s%> once <S%G2178><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> in that <S%G3739><s%> he liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, he liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Likewise <S%G3779><s%> reckon <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5737><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> unto sin <S%G266><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%>.

Let <S%G936><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> reign <S%G936><s%> <S%G5720><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> body <S%G4983><s%>, that <S%G1519><s%> ye should obey <S%G5219><s%> <S%G5721><s%> it <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>.

Neither <S%G3366><s%> yield ye <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5720><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> unto sin <S%G266><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5657><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> those that are alive <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> shall <S%G2961><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have dominion over <S%G2961><s%> <S%G5692><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? shall we sin <S%G264><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>? 'Elohim forbid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5636><s%>.

Know ye <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> ye yield <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5719><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> obey <S%G5218><s%>, his servants <S%G1401><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5748><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> ye obey <S%G5219><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; whether <S%G2273><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of `Ovedience <S%G5218><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> be thanked <S%G5485><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> ye have obeyed <S%G5219><s%> <S%G5656><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> that form <S%G5179><s%> of doctrine <S%G1322><s%> which <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> was delivered you <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.
Being <S%G1659><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> made free <S%G1659><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, ye became the servants <S%G1402><s%> <S%G5681><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

I speak <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> after the manner of men <S%G442><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the infirmity <S%G769><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> ye have yielded <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5656><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to iniquity <S%G458><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>; even so <S%G3779><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> yield <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5657><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to righteousness <S%G1343><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> holiness <S%G38><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>, ye were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> from righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3767><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> had ye <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> those things whereof <S%G3739><s%> ye are <S%G1870><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> <S%G5736><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of those things <S%G1565><s%> is death <S%G2288><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> being made free <S%G1659><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> become servants <S%G1402><s%> <S%G5685><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, ye have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> holiness <S%G38><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the wages <S%G3800><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> is death <S%G2288><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the gift <S%G5486><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%>.
